originalText.text: Even though the wax specialists are very good, it‚Äôs like the women at the front desk think we‚Äôre stupid. She told me the wax was $61, and gave me the brochure where it said the wax was $61, then when I was done with the wax, she tried to charge me $69. When I told her she literally said $61 and it said it on the brochure as well, she just kept trying to charge me $69 as if it was somehow my fault? Or my problem? Did they not get the memo at this place that what price you tell customers before a service is‚Ä¶ what the price should be?! Actually embarrassing for them to be honest. Never coming back here. PS. I refused to pay $69 obviously and paid $61, and the woman was so annoyed. My god you can‚Äôt make this stuff up. This was today (12/09/23) between 4:30 and 5pm.

originalText.text: Maya is the best! She takes her time and is so precise with everything. She is so calming and sweet and is very relaxing as well! 10/10 recommend.

text.text: Maya is the best! She takes her time and is so precise with everything. She is so calming and sweet and is very relaxing as well! 10/10 recommend.

originalText.text:
I have never written a negative review. maybe I had the wrong waxer, but this was easily one of the worst waxes I‚Äôve ever gotten.
She left a strip of hair around my bikini area claiming it was ‚Äúinner thigh‚Äù when it very much wasn‚Äôt. My thighs were shaven, my bikini wasn‚Äôt‚Äîshe said it would be $12 additional dollars on the already $52 wax LOL. The strip of hair she left was so thin and petty, I wish I could post a photo just so you could see. Imagine a single row of hairüò≠
I got an underarm wax too, i had barely and hair to begin with, but they were long enough to remove. She left probably 30% of the hair and didn‚Äôt tweeze the rest. When I asked her to please remove the remaining hair, she did 1 additional strip (on only 1 underarm) then sent me home looking exactly the same HAHAA

I would stay away from here unless you were recommended to go to a specific waxer. Clean environment and nice aesthetic are the only upsides I experienced. Good luck!!

UPDATE: Manager contacted me offering 10% off of the next service. This is how they compensate negative experiences lol

originalText.text: Stopped in for a quick underarm wax and love this place. Friendly, quick service and the wax is made for sensitive skin, it was easy and smooth to remove without any pull and it wasn‚Äôt too warm. Great special for new customers which was a nice surprise.

text.text: Stopped in for a quick underarm wax and love this place. Friendly, quick service and the wax is made for sensitive skin, it was easy and smooth to remove without any pull and it wasn‚Äôt too warm. Great special for new customers which was a nice surprise.

originalText.text:
This is the only place I go to get waxed. I am a male, Suava is so nice, the place is so clean, I love that they are natural and everyone is so friendly.
Thank you, I highly recommend this place to anyone looking to get waxed. Great location as well!
